text:
How do I reload tmux conf?
There are two main ways to reload your tmux configuration (tmux.conf):

1. From within tmux, you can type:
```
:source-file ~/.tmux.conf
```
(Press `prefix + :` first to enter command mode, then type the command)

2. From the terminal, you can run:
```
tmux source-file ~/.tmux.conf
```

The `prefix` is typically `Ctrl+b` by default, unless you've changed it in your configuration.

Both methods will reload your tmux configuration without requiring you to restart tmux.
